general_advisory: It is recommended to plant rice and wheat considering the weather conditions. Ensure proper care for poultry.

advisory: Plant rice seeds in well-drained soil.
Keep the field moist during the growing season.
Sow wheat seeds in a well-prepared seedbed.
Apply nitrogen fertilizers at the appropriate time.
Provide adequate shelter for poultry during extreme weather.
Ensure access to clean water and balanced feed for healthy growth.
